titles.title: A bill to prohibit the Secretary of Energy from enforcing regulations pertaining to certain battery chargers.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

bill.summary: 7/19/2012--Introduced. Prohibits the Secretary of Energy from finalizing, implementing, or enforcing a proposed rule entitled "Energy Conservation Program: Energy Conservation Standards for Battery Chargers and External Power Supplies," or any substantially similar regulation, regarding product class 7 (certain high-energy battery chargers described in such proposed rule).
